title: [Capstone] Good Mentors for Capstone Project
content: Can seniors please suggest good mentors (EC Campus) for the Capstone project in the 5th Semester. Our domain is related to ML and Data Analytics, and it may advance to further domains as the project progresses. So we would like to opt a good mentor for our project.

comments.body: Arti arya, kundhavai , sudeepa ma'am are good , and if u want lenient ones that don't know much but won't bother u, there are plenty of them like suja cm, pranjali thakre, surbhi etc

ML and Data Analytics is still pretty broad. You're going to have to narrow it down instead of branching out. People might be able to help you then. The best mentor is someone whose research experience and interests align with your project.
